title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about fishing?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman: Seeing fishing in a dream is one of the constantly recurring visions that is good news for its owner, as this vision carries many interpretations and interpretations that vary according to the social status of the viewer and according to the type of water from which it emerges. The fish was caught and we will refer to this in our article. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman. What is the interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman? Seeing a married woman fishing in a dream means that she will undertake many projects from which she will make great profits. This dream may be good news that she will become pregnant soon, If she is experiencing problems with her husband, then this dream indicates that she will get rid of all her worries and burdens. Fishing in her dream shows that she is working hard and diligently to achieve a better future and prove that she is sacrificing to provide a safe life for her family. If the fortuneteller is sick, then watching her fish is a sign that she will get rid of From her illness and recovered. When a wife sees that she is going fishing, this means that she is cooperating with her husband and supporting him in the burdens and responsibilities of life. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. What is the interpretation of a dream about a son? Sirin fishing? The scholar Ibn Sirin says that fishing for a married woman indicates that this woman will soon hear a lot of good and joyful news that will change her life. If she sees her catching a fish from turbid water, this symbolizes the many fears and problems that she suffers from and her bad condition and that she Trying to find solutions to get rid of it. Ibn Sirin says that the size of the fish varies in interpretation. If the fish is large in size, this means that the woman will receive many good things and blessings, and if the fish is small in size, this means that she will be exposed to a major financial crisis that will affect her. If she sees that she is catching a strange fish, this symbolizes her multiple projects and sources of income to secure her future. And her life. Catching fish from the river indicates the presence of major pressures and problems in her life. The most important interpretations of a dream about fishing for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about fishing with a hook for a married woman When a married woman sees that she is catching a fish with a hook, this means that she will obtain a lot of sustenance and many goods, and an indication that she She has great intelligence and cunning, and her dream shows her intense love for her. Her husband and his love for her, so be careful because you will be exposed to a major financial crisis. Interpretation of a dream about hand fishing for a married woman. Among the interpretations of a dream about hand fishing for a married woman is that it indicates her hard work and patience in practical life until she gets a lot of money and it can symbolize the simple work that this woman does. To get money, and perhaps her vision while fishing is that she can make her decisions calmly and slowly, but if she sees herself catching tilapia with her hand, this means that she will obtain money through legal means after hard work. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married womanIf a married woman sees that

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive in a dream

preview.html: When they see the deceased in a dream while he is alive, some people feel fear and want to know the interpretation of this dream and its meanings, and whether it is a good or bad sign for the dreamer. There are a large number of clues and interpretations of dreams, and we find in general that scholars and diligent scholars are looking for interpretations, and site managers do not They interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive. When we see a dead person in a dream while he is alive, we search for the meaning of this dream and what its connotations are, as the various website did, collecting the most important interpretations, including: Whoever sees in his dream that a dead person knows him was Alive in a dream, it may indicate the high status that the dead person has reached, and God knows best. A dream about a dead person who was sick in the dream may indicate the dreamer’s failure to worship and obey him. And God knows best. When you see a dead person in a dream who is alive, and his appearance is good, this may indicate the dreamer’s closeness to the Blessed and Most High God. If you see yourself laughing with a dead person in the dream, this may indicate that you are traveling far from your family. From He sees in his dream that he was beating a dead person in a dream, it may indicate that the dreamer has strayed from his religion and must repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. In the event that you see a dead person beating a living person in a dream, this may indicate the good that he will attain during this period, and God knows best. If we dream of a dead person sleeping in a dream, this is a sign of the comfort and reassurance that he enjoys afterwards, thanks to God. Seeing the dead alive in a dream can mean positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life, thanks to God. Read also: Interpretation of gold in a dream for Nablus. Interpretation of a dream about hugging Dead people and crying in a dream Seeing a dead person in a dream alive and embracing the dreamer may indicate the abundance of sustenance that will come to the dreamer and righteousness by God’s grace. If you see a dead person hugging a dead person in a dream, this means that the dreamer will offer a lot of alms and supplications to the deceased. If a girl sees If an unmarried woman hugs a dead man in a dream, this indicates her long life thanks to God. Also, to see a father or mother dead and the dreamer embracing them can indicate the health and well-being that the dreamer enjoys. In the event that you see a deceased person hugging in a dream, this is a sign of solving problems And crises in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that a dead person was crying in the neighborhood can indicate positive changes occurring in the life of the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. A dream about a dead person crying may indicate Over the living in a dream indicates the sustenance coming from the dreamer and happy events with the grace of God. Seeing a dead person crying over the dreamer may indicate good deeds that the dreamer will do during that period. Seeing a dead person crying for a living person in a dream indicates that the worries and problems that the dreamer faced The past days have been overcome by the grace of God. Dreaming of a dead husband crying in a dream may indicate that his wife is close to God Almighty.

title: Interpretation of taking off the veil in a dream. Interpretation of taking off the veil in a dream

preview.html: A dream about removing the veil of an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man to see a veiled girl without a veil, revealing her hair in front of a strange man, according to Ibn Sirin and. Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Taking off the hijab in a dream is one of the dreams that many of us have, especially veiled women, as seeing the hijab being taken off in a dream is one of the disturbing dreams that raise fear and anxiety among many people about the major religious shortcomings in life, and the hijab is part of the Sunnah, and the duties that must be adhered to. It is required by the Sunnah of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. Then we review for you in our article today the interpretation of the vision of taking off the veil in a dream according to the great translator and researcher Ibn Katheer, who explained it completely. Interpretation of the dream of taking off the veil A woman’s veil: her husband, her covering, and her manager, and its characteristics are many, and if she puts it on her head She loses her modesty among people. If the dreamer sees that her hijab is black and worn out, this indicates the husband’s deception and that it is raining. This indicates the deception of the woman’s enemies and their shame over her picture with her husband. If the dreamer is not married, then seeing the hijab in her dream indicates a loss of money or that A disaster is coming. If a woman takes off her hijab in a dream, she will lose her protection and chastity, as wearing it indicates that. If she takes off the hijab in front of people and is ashamed, this means that people will know about the dreamer something shameful, such as disobedience during the school year, for example. If she takes off the hijab without shame, this indicates On self-esteem, and then something positive is revealed against people’s opinion, such as success, graduation... or doing a worthwhile job. Interpretation of taking off the veil in a dream for single people: A young man who sees in a dream a girl unknown to him and taking off the veil from her head is evidence that the young man will get married soon. A young man seeing a girl he knows in reality and knowing that she is covered without a hijab in a dream is evidence that the young man will marry her. Interpretation of taking off the hijab in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman wearing a hijab in a dream is evidence that God will cover her with marriage very soon. An unmarried girl taking off the hijab from her head in Dreaming in front of a man is evidence that the man will be her share and marry her soon. Seeing a girl who took off her hijab and taking it off again in a dream is evidence that she made a wrong decision and needs to correct it. Seeing an unmarried girl removing her hijab in a dream is evidence that she will live her life as a bachelor. Seeing a woman An unmarried woman taking off her hijab in a dream in front of someone who does not know her is evidence of revealing her hijab. Interpretation of taking off the hijab in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman wearing the hijab in a dream means that her life is very calm and stable. A married woman wearing the hijab in a dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon. Taking off A married woman with the hijab off her head in a dream indicates that her life will become unstable with her husband. Interpretation of taking off the hijab in a dream for a man: A man seeing a veiled woman in a dream is evidence of his wife’s righteousness in reality and good morals and religion. When a man sees a girl he does not know who is not covered by the hijab, this is evidence He will do the work

When a man sees a girl he does not know who is not covered by the hijab, this is evidence He will do the work

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving apples in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving apples. Every beginning has an end, because a person’s existence in the world from the moment of his birth must end in it, which is death, because the human soul. There is trust with a person, and trust must be restored. Death also means the end of a person’s life in this world, the departure of his soul from his body, and the cessation of all his work apart from work except his transition. To another stage after death, where there is no end for people to be held accountable for their actions, and death is the end of existence and the end of life. Interpretation of the dead eating apples in a dream: Death is the departure of the soul from the body and the transition from the house of annihilation to the house of salvation, where deeds end, newspapers are removed, the doors of repentance are closed, and so on. What remains is a lifeless and useless corpse buried under the soil. The dreamer seeing that the dead person is eating apples means that the dreamer will commit sins and misdeeds. If a fortuneteller eats apples with a dead person, he is depressed and unwilling to live. Also, eating apples with the dead is a bad omen that he will suffer from A health crisis and the deterioration of his health. For a dead person to offer apples to the monarch to eat indicates that the fortuneteller lost his money as a result of his failure in a certain task. A married woman who sees a dead man eating apples indicates her betrayal of her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving apples to single people. Death is a heavy guest who visits you at any time and in any place. Any place against your will (every soul will taste death) No one remains immortal, the world is perishing and nothing is permanent except the face of God, and we will count it as we have one foot in the world. There is no home for us to live in after death except what we built before it. A single woman sees a dead man giving her apples, and this is a skin. Good for her with a great diet. The deceased gave apples to unmarried women and did not eat them which means she will lose the things she was expecting. Seeing fresh apples for single women is a good omen that they will receive offers to work and help others. Having an apple tree for an unmarried woman indicates her commitment and conviction. Rotten apples for unmarried women warn of health problems in the coming days. See also: Interpretation of dreams of a dead person wearing dirty clothes in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a dead person giving applesTo pregnant womenDuring pregnancy, a pregnant woman needs a healthy and balanced diet that contains all the nutrients, vitamins, proteins, phosphorus and zinc And all the important elements for her health and the health of her fetus, so that the pregnancy period is good without pain. . And problems: Seeing a pregnant woman with an apple on the skin is a good sign that her birth will be easy. While giving apples to a pregnant woman portends difficulty in her birth and the emergence of problems during birth. A pregnant woman’s observation of colored apples indicates her different personalities. Since a pregnant woman dreams of fresh apples, this is a good omen that she will give birth. Children are of great importance. Her husband giving her apples also indicates the intense love relationship between them. Interpretation of dreams: Green apples for the dead: Death is not the end of the world. There are people who die while they are alive and lose hope and do not achieve their dreams. There are people who live life even after their death because of the achievements they have achieved.

title: Interpretation of seeing menstrual bleeding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Ibn Shaheen. Through the website visionroy2a.com Seeing menstrual blood in a dream indicates the marriage of an unmarried girl, and indicates the approaching birth of a pregnant woman, as it indicates an abundance of money and black menstrual blood It indicates committing sins and may indicate marital problems, and we will explain that in this article. The appearance of menstrual blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin in a dream is about an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, as well as an unmarried man and young man, as well as a divorced woman and a widow, and presenting them. Interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, and other interpreters, ancient and modern, follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing menstruation in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman indicates freedom from worries and problems Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a man indicates wealth and riches. Seeing black menstrual blood in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to adversity and adversity. If the husband sees that his wife is menstruating, it appears that she will soon become pregnant with a boy. See also: Written supplication for menstrual blood. What is the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood? In a dream for a single woman: If a girl sees menstrual blood in her dream, it indicates the approaching marriage or engagement. Seeing black menstrual blood in a dream for a girl indicates committing sins. What is the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees menstrual blood in a dream It indicates her marital happiness and abundance of money. If a married woman sees her menstrual cycle and has not yet given birth, it indicates abundant wealth and strength from good offspring. Seeing contaminated menstrual blood for a married woman indicates insomnia, sadness, and many quarrels that may lead to separation. See also: Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood In a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees menstrual blood in a dream, it indicates the approaching date of birth. If a pregnant woman sees a black period in the blood, it indicates a delayed birth. Seeing menstrual blood in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a boy. What is the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a pregnant woman? Interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream: If a divorced woman sees menstrual blood in her dream, it shows that he has a lot of money. Seeing black menstrual blood in a divorced woman’s dream indicates troubles and problems in the life of a divorced person. Seeing a bull beating in a dream for a divorced woman indicates evil and wickedness. And attacking a bull indicates committing sins. See also: Interpretation of seeing a man’s sperm in a dream Interpretation of seeing menstrual pads in a dream: Seeing menstrual pads It indicates committing a sin. Seeing menstrual pads for a married woman indicates family problems and quarrels. Seeing a lot of menstrual blood indicates problems What is the interpretation of a dream about heavy menstrual blood: Seeing heavy menstrual blood in a married woman’s dream indicates many troubles and troubles and may indicate forbidden money or indicate a new pregnancy. Dreaming of heavy menstrual blood indicates many problems and quarrels.

Dreaming of heavy menstrual blood indicates many problems and quarrels.

title: Interpretation of dreams that I was married and I am single with Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I got married while I was single. Many girls dream that they got married while they are single, and the dream has many interpretations, including that it heralds good news and good news that they will hear soon, including the sad news that warns her of what follows. This depends on her state during the dream and what she was doing at that time. What is the interpretation of the dream that I am married and I am single? Seeing an unmarried girl getting married in a dream indicates the goodness and happiness that will come to her soon. A girl’s dream of getting married is an indication that she will soon marry a young man who has morals and religion who will love her very much and their life will be happy. Also, if she dreams That I got married while I was single, this may be a sign that he is overthinking the issue of marriage. Seeing unmarried women getting married in a dream is a sign of achieving goals that they had been planning for a long time. I dreamed that I was married while I was single by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision A girl in a dream because she will get married with the goodness and happiness that she will get and the good things that will come to her soon, God willing. Seeing a girl in a dream getting married means success and obtaining a high position and a good job in the future, as well as an indication of her excellence in studies. Seeing unmarried women getting married in a dream It is a sign of abundant sustenance and abundant money that you will get soon, God willing. As for seeing a girl in a dream getting married while she is sad, this is evidence of sadness and the bad psychological state she is experiencing at this time in her life. I dreamed that I got married while I was single to someone I do not know. Seeing a girl in a dream Marrying a person she does not know and is not satisfied with is a sign of the family problems she faces and that she is bearing a lot of pressure and may be related to the marriage issue. Also, a single woman who dreams of marrying a person she does not actually know indicates the deterioration of her psychological state and the presence of problems at work, which It leads to her losing her current job. Seeing a girl who is not a relative because she is married to someone she does not know symbolizes the loss of a relative or friend, her sadness for him, and the deterioration of her psychological state because of this problem. I dreamed that I got married while I was single to someone I know. A girl’s dream about her getting married to someone she knows is a sign that she She will be happy and menstruate without problems and crises, God willing. Seeing an unmarried woman marrying someone she already knows can be a sign that she will marry this person soon and their life will be happy and stable, God willing. Seeing a girl in a dream marrying someone she knows, but she was sad at In a dream, this is an unfavorable sign because it is a sign of sadness, anguish, and problems that she is going through in this period of her life. Seeing a girl who has no relationship in a dream marrying someone she knows symbolizes that she is strong and can solve her problems quietly and calmly. Seeing a girl in a dream marrying someone Knowing him means that she is good, has a good personality, and has good behavior and reputation among people. I dreamed that I got married while I was single without marriage. To dream of a girl who is not related because she gets married without marriage is a sign of

title: Interpretation of a white dog in a dream: Seeing a white dog in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a white dog for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, if a white dog bites a small dog, a puppy, a colored pet dog Seeing a dog attacking They chase me and chase me Ibn Sirin and others A white dog in a dream is one of the strangest dreams that we see in our dreams. There is no doubt that vision has an impact on our lives. Therefore, when one of us sees any vision in a dream, he searches through many social networking sites for the correct interpretation of this vision. Today, through this site, the interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream is presented by the commentator Ibn Sirin and leading Arab scholars and translators. Interpretation of the white dog in a dream. As for the white dog in The dream generally indicates, as does the black dog in its interpretation, but to a lesser extent, misfortunes, their appearance, and a period of disappearance of worry, worry, and sadness. He sees that he brings it to his house and eats the food of his house or in the rooms of his house, and then in his house there is an unfortunate person conspiring against him or causing him sadness and pain. Interpretation of a white dog in a dream by Ibn Sirini Some jurists and translators say that seeing a white dog in a dream has a meaning and a sign, and the vision differs from one person to another. Depending on the type and size of the dog. The intense sadness that the dreamer is exposed to, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a white dog in one dream. If a single girl sees a large, deep-seated dog in a dream, biting each other, this is evidence of the theft of joy from her and the sadness that this girl will go through in the coming period, and God is Most High. And I know. Interpretation of a white dog in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream a white dog walking down the street and she looks at it without being attacked or attacked, then this is evidence of comfort and reassurance in her family life. And God knows best. Interpretation of a white dog in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that a white pet dog is next to her, this indicates the purity of her intentions towards others, and if the dog increases its ferocity in her home or bedroom, then someone will enter the place and carry evil or a conspiracy for his sake. If she is bitten, she must reconsider her actions towards her religion and adhere to it, because this indicates weakness in her religion or committing major sins. If a pregnant woman dreams of an obedient, domesticated white dog sitting next to her or entering her house, this is evidence of easy childbirth and the health of the mother and child. Good. Top I know. Interpretation of a white dog in a dream Divorced If a divorced woman dreams of a white dog that was attacked by her, this means that there are unfaithful people in this woman’s life and she must be careful of those around her. She dreams of a small white dog and a pet walking beside her and not interfering with her or causing him any harm. Harm This is evidence of comfort and goodness on the way of this woman, and God is the Most High. Interpretation of a white dog attacking me in a dream: If one sees that a wild white dog is attacking him, then he seeks to harm the man and will not be able to do so; Because whoever wants to harm him is better than the one he sees. Interpretation of a white dog bite in a dream: If the dog bites the fortuneteller, then he will be harmed by that person, and

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a gold necklace according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gold necklace in a dream: The gold necklace is among the list of precious jewelry, and this list includes many tools that women adorn themselves with, especially on public occasions. This varies depending on many things, including whether one sees the necklace being sold, bought, or lost. What concerns us in this context is mentioning the specific connotations of seeing a golden necklace in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a gold necklace in a dream: Seeing a golden necklace in a dream indicates The desires, ambitions, and aspirations that one seeks and works with great effort to achieve, and the battles that one fights with strength and perseverance to taste the sweetness of victory and reap its fruits. The dream interpretation of a gold necklace in a dream also symbolizes kindness, good news, achieving the desired, abundance of sustenance, blessing in what the person earns, and success in The business that he manages and supervises, if his business is aimed at profit, stability, marriage qualifications and the possibility of securing the future. If one sees a necklace made of pure gold, this indicates that he has won a valuable prize, obtained a great benefit, and achieved a lot of success and progress in his life, He entered into many projects that brought him abundant money and great profit. As for seeing the silver necklace, seeing it expresses the goals that a person aspires to achieve, the simple desires that he is trying to achieve, and the changes that he sees in his life that have a great impact on the transformation from one situation. To another. Jurists believe that silver in a dream is better than gold, as gold is evil and a heavy burden that a person cannot bear, while silver represents goodness, simplicity of life, and righteous offspring. But in the case of a necklace, a gold necklace is better than silver because it symbolizes status, prestige, obedient influence, and popularity among people. People. If one sees the gold necklace and some silver coins at the same time, this indicates that in the near future he will marry a woman of beautiful beauty and famous lineage who will be the best of his wife and help him in difficult life. Circumstances and takes his hand to reach the top and achieve achievement. The necklace also expresses assuming high positions and achieving many goals, losing despair and distress, improving status and high status, and reaping the fruits of patience and calculating actions. If the necklace is made of beads, this is a sign of incompetence, and poverty. , the inability to face life’s problems, the tendency to avoid responsibility, the feeling of a state of general weakness and the inability to advance, walk, and stand in the middle or at the beginning of the path where the courage to go through the experience is lost. Finally, the pendant expresses confidence or the message entrusted to the person to deliver to the place What is required, and the duties assigned to him, to be the messenger or mediator between the trustee and the one to whom the will is transferred. Interpretation of the dream of the golden necklace by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing the golden necklace in a dream that it is a vision that expresses sustenance, wealth, prosperity, flourishing, business prosperity, changing circumstances, and earning money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a burning person

preview.html: And if he tries to extinguish the burning one, this indicates that he is trying to stand by his side and support him in these matters that he sees, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a person burning in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a person burning in a dream, and she knows him well. This indicates that This person will face many problems in his life and that they will appear, and God knows best. An unmarried woman who sees a man burning in a dream, and she feels very sorry for him. It shows that he will face some problems with this person in life and in the coming period. And if an unmarried woman sees that a person is burning, it is unknown to her, so she postpones it in a dream. It is interpreted that it will help an unknown person get rid of many problems. Likewise, an unmarried woman who sees in a dream that someone has suffered severe burns in the dream and she is afraid. It is an indication that this single woman will face many Of problems away from her and she is afraid of them. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fire (fire) in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing someone burning in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreamed that a stranger was burning in front of her in a dream. It shows that there is someone she knows in life who is suffering from problems. Many in his life. Thus, a divorced woman who sees that her husband was burning in a dream and extinguished it in the dream. It appears that her husband is going through many ordeals and sad things in his life and she will help him. And if the married woman is looking for someone who is burning, she takes him out in the dream. This is a sign that she will live She is happy with her life and helps people with their problems. Likewise, a married woman who sees that one of her acquaintances is burning in a dream and is afraid for him indicates that at this time she is meeting someone she knows who is in trouble and she cannot help him. Interpretation of seeing a person burning in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is looking To see someone burning in a dream while she is sad shows that she will face many sad things in her life during this time. And if a divorced woman sees that someone is burning in a dream, and she feels afraid. This is a sign that she will try hard to help someone close to her get rid of problems. Perhaps a divorced woman who sees her ex-husband It is burning in the dream while she extinguishes it in the dream. It indicates that she will see her husband suffering from major problems in his life, and God knows best. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband asks her to extinguish it while it is burning, it indicates that this divorced woman will get rid of many things in her life, God willing. Read also : Interpretation of a dream about a fire in the house. Interpretation of seeing a person burning in a dream about a man and its meaning. If one sees in a dream that a person is burning in front of him in the dream, he is afraid of him. An indication that he will face his close friend in major crises and problems. And if one looks at a burning person in a dream, and feels... With great concern towards him. A clear explanation is that he is trying hard to help someone in his life by getting rid of problems. And if the dreamer sees his brother in a dream burning, and takes him out in the dream. This is an indication that his brother will fall into many trials and tribulations in his life, and God knows best. As he sees it The dreamer sees a

And if a divorced woman sees that someone is burning in a dream, and she feels afraid. This is a sign that she will try hard to help someone close to her get rid of problems. Perhaps a divorced woman who sees her ex-husband It is burning in the dream while she extinguishes it in the dream. It indicates that she will see her husband suffering from major problems in his life, and God knows best. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband asks her to extinguish it while it is burning, it indicates that this divorced woman will get rid of many things in her life, God willing.
